text: Toy, khto maye yasne znamennya vid Hospoda svoho, prochytane svidkom vid Nʹoho, do poyavy yakoho providnykom i mylistyu bulo Pysannya Musy – same taki ye viruyuchymy v [Koran]! A tym, yaki ne uviruvaly v tse y nalezhatʹ do riznykh sekt, obitsyano vohonʹ! Tozh ne sumnivaysya v tsʹomu, adzhe tse — istyna vid Hospoda tvoho. Ale bilʹshistʹ lyudey ne viruye
